description:
The reason voters are unsurprised with Trump’s second term is that he promised to do all of this. This is also why polling shows that a majority of Americans believe Trump is doing what he said he was going to do. This is also why it’s comical that Kamala Harris thinks she’s the only one who knew what he promised he was going to do.

Kamala Harris is out of hiding: "Each day over the past few months creates great sense of fear" pic.twitter.com/7aaTw9QTxr
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) April 4, 2025
title: Kamala Harris tosses the word salad about "FEAR," but she's no FDR...

description:
It’s unclear where the Dems found the nerve to override Title IX, but under the guise of inclusivity, they have decided to trash women’s rights in favor of giving a minority of men special rights. Subsequently, Washington State Democrats have gone after high schools and are forcing them to allow this nonsense to continue with threats of legal battles.

TRANSLATION: The @wiaawa caved to political pressure from people like WA Superintendent Chris Reykdal & AG Nick Brown and will continue to allow boys to brutalize girls in women's sports pic.twitter.com/y6n3bnMkMu
— Ari Hoffman 🎗 (@thehoffather)
title: A state athletic org was going to ban girls from girls' sports, but then the Democrat Party threatened them

description:
Fat pride is officially out, and the narrative that “obesity is healthy” is over. Nonetheless, there are still leftist “personal trainers” out there who exclusively work with people uninterested in losing weight.

“I think it's meant to exclude people seeking help and guidance to solve a problem,” Crowder said.

According to Men's Health:

THE DELUGE OF TikTok influencers selling the
title: Watch: "Fat Pride" is OVER and the body positivity movement is a lie

description:
San Francisco is changing the way it fines traffic violations. Good news for comedians everywhere: men and women aren’t the same. Bruce Springsteen is releasing new music. Well, old music. New old music. Finally, we take a look at the new Naked Gun trailer to see if Hollywood is back.

BODY POSITIVITY IS A LIE

  • Elle Baez - I Love My Body (Official Video)
title: Sources: Fat Pride is Over, California Sucks, and So Does Springsteen

description:
If you still watch cable news, you may have heard that Trump voters have buyer's remorse over voting for Trump. Not if you spoke to actual Trump voters. "Buyer's remorse" is the talking point the billionaires who control the left came up with about one of our billionaires. Buyer's remorse over deportations (nope), egg prices (that have gone down), and D.O.G.E.. Now they are having buyer's remorse over tariffs. At least there is Scott Jennings on CNN as the lone voice of reason that, no, people who voted for Donald Trump are not turning on Donald Trump.

Now, can a news outlet run a poll where a question is specifically asked in away to produce a random number that can be used to "validate" buyer's remorse? Sure, of course. But as Jennings points out, the copium is seeping into Democrat brains.

This is a healthy level of
title: Scott Jennings shuts down CNN libs who claim there is buyer's remorse for voting Trump: "Copium among Democrats..."

description:
We've all felt that cringe go up our spines when we hear Hollywood is remaking a classic movie from our youth. They almost NEVER are any good, and turn into satirical parodies of the source material if not modernized, woke bullplop. But what if you announce a remake of satire? Those of us in the age range of unc to oldhead remember the 80s classic "The Naked Gun" along with the two sequels. A Hollywood remake? There is no way this won't piss us off!

They just dropped a teaser trailer (you know how I feel about those) for the remake and... God help me saying this, it ACKSHUALLY looks hilarious.

The single most important
title: Liam Neeson is remaking the 80s classic "The Naked Gun," and God help us, this actually looks hilarious
